title: The Shot
creator_credit: Puven Pather, Tim Kreibig and AFTRS
brief_description: After a prolonged career as a war correspondent photographer, Mick thinks he can see through the horror of the environment he works in, until he falls victim to his own convictions! A look into the moral and ethical dilemmas of a war correspondent. Cast features Tony Martin as Mick and mark Lee as Terry.
